content.html: (I have chronic pain) I'll be talking to someone and they'll say something like "Big deal, my back hurts all the time and sometimes I can't get out of bed because of it" and I'll have to be like oh honey, that's not the norm for human bodies. You have chronic pain, too.
content.value:
(I have chronic pain) 

I'll be talking to someone and they'll say something like "Big deal, my back hurts all the time and sometimes I can't get out of bed because of it" and I'll have to be like oh honey, that's not the norm for human bodies. You have chronic pain, too.
